sections.TOP: House of Pahl023447kx6flcwv485b88leximyet1sv74ojq51792962015-03-25T19:08:10ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* In the books */The '''House of Pahl''' is one of the ancient noble [[Slavery|slaver]] families from the city of [[Meereen]]. Their family colors are yellow and black.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the House of Pahl is one of the ancient slaving families of Meereen, known as the [[Great Masters]]. They own a pyramid made of pink and white bricks, the family's colors.
sections.Known members: * {[[Oznak zo Pahl]]}, a Meereenese warrior. Beheaded in duel by [[Daario Naharis]] during the [[Siege of Meereen]].
